dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Luna (for herself and Mrs. Miller of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To increase penalties for crimes against children.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Repeat Child Sex Offenders Act.

subsection.text: Subsection (a) of section 2421 of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking or imprisoned not more than 10 years, or both and inserting and punished by death or imprisoned for life.
Section 2421A of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking imprisoned for not more than 10 years, or both and inserting and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and
in subsection (b), in the continuation text following paragraph (2), by striking imprisoned for not more than 25 years, or both and inserting and punished by death or imprisoned for life.

subsection.text: Section 2422 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking or imprisoned not more than 20 years, or both and inserting and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and
in subsection (b), by striking imprisoned not less than 10 years or for life and inserting punished by death or imprisoned for life.

subsection.text: Section 1591 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking by a fine under this title and imprisonment for any term of years not less than 15 or for life and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and

in paragraph (2), by striking by a fine under this title and imprisonment for not less than 10 years or for life and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking shall be fined under this title, imprisoned for a term not to exceed 25 years, or both and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life.

subsection.text: Section 2423 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking imprisoned not less than 10 years or for life ” and inserting punished by death or imprisoned for life;
in subsection (b), by striking or imprisoned not more than 30 years, or both and inserting and punished by death or imprisoned for life;
in subsection (c), by striking or imprisoned not more than 30 years, or both and inserting and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and
in subsection (d), by striking imprisoned for not more than 30 years, or both and inserting and punished by death or imprisoned for life.

subsection.text: Section 2426(a) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking be 3 times the term of imprisonment otherwise provided by this chapter and inserting be punished by death or imprisoned for life.

section.text: Subsection (e) of section 2423 of title 18, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

subsection.text: Whoever, for the purpose of commercial advantage or private financial gain, arranges, induces, procures, or facilitates the travel of a person knowing that such a person is traveling in interstate commerce or foreign commerce with intent to engage in any illicit sexual conduct shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life.

section.text: Section 2251A(a) is amended by striking punished by imprisonment for not less than 30 years or and inserting punished by death or.

subsection.text: Section 2241(c) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking imprisoned for not less than 30 years or for life and inserting punished by death or imprisoned for life.
Section 2243 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), in the continuation text following paragraph (2), by striking shall be fined under this title, imprisoned not more than 15 years, or both and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life;

in subsection (b), in the continuation text following paragraph (2), by striking shall be fined under this title, imprisoned not more than 15 years, or both and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and
in subsection (c), by striking shall be fined under this title, imprisoned not more than 15 years, or both and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life.

subsection.text: Section 2244 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (3), by striking shall be fined under this title, imprisoned not more than two years, or both and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life;
in paragraph (4), by striking shall be fined under this title, imprisoned not more than two years, or both and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life;

in paragraph (5), by striking shall be fined under this title and imprisoned for any term of years or for life and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and

in paragraph (6), by striking shall be fined under this title, imprisoned not more than two years, or both and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (c), by striking the maximum term of imprisonment that may be imposed for the offense shall be twice that otherwise provided in this section and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life.

subsection.text: Section 2245(a) of title 18, United States Code, is amended by striking shall be punished by death or imprisoned for any term of years or for life and inserting shall be fined under this title and punished by death or imprisoned for life.
